hadiths.text: Narrated Abu 'Atiyyah:I and Masruq entered upon 'Aishah and we said: Mother of believers, there are two persons from the Companions of the Muhammad (ﷺ). One of them hastens to break the fast and hastens to pray while the other delays to break the fast and delays praying. She asked: Which of them hastens to break the fast and hasten to pray ? We replied: 'Abd Allah (b. Mas'ud). She said: Thus did the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) do

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُسْتَحَبُّ مِنْ تَعْجِيلِ الْفِطْرِ
chapter.eng-name: The Recommendation Of Hastening To Break The Fast
